newsitem.title: ISRAEL: IMF delegation to visit Israel for annual report.
newsitem.headline: IMF delegation to visit Israel for annual report.

text.p: An International Monetary Fund (IMF) delegation will arrive in Israel on September 1 to prepare its annual report on the Israeli economy, the Bank of Israel said.
The delegation will include five economists from the European and fiscal divisions of the IMF.
The delegation will meet both public and private- sector heads of the Israeli economy, the central bank said.

The visit will last until September 11, when the delegation will present its preliminary report to the bank of Israel. The delegation will later present its final report in Washington to the board of governors of the IMF.
